sentences.en: "At least we weren't kidnapped." — "I'm glad of that," was the laconic response.
sentences.cn: “至少咱们没被绑架。”——“对此我很庆幸，”答复就是这么简短的一句话。

sentences.en: A slight frown and a laconic'Yes,'were the answer.
sentences.cn: 回答是淡淡的皱眉和一声简短的 “ 是的 ”.

sentences.en: And so a short answer is often spoken of as a laconic answer.
sentences.cn: 因此简洁的回答通常被称为拉科人的回答.

sentences.en: Do you know the word LACONIC?
sentences.cn: 你认识“LACONIC”这个单词 吗 ?

sentences.en: He sent me a laconic private message.
sentences.cn: 他给我一封简要的私人函件.

sentences.en: Henry's date was very laconic, only saying two sentences the entire evening.
sentences.cn: 亨利的约会十分简洁, 整晚他只说了两句话.

sentences.en: Objective : To seek a more laconic and effective method to describe the blood apparent viscosity.
sentences.cn: 目的: 寻找一种更为简洁有效的描述血液表观粘度的方法.

sentences.en: Perfect site! Anything superfluous, all is laconic and beautiful. Thanks!
sentences.cn: 完美的网站! 所有全部都是简洁和美丽的. 感谢!

sentences.en: The war experience helped to give the New Frontier generations casual and laconic tone.
sentences.cn: 战争的经历有助于使新边疆这一辈养成不拘形式和说话干脆的作风.

sentences.en: This design has the advantage of having a laconic structure and economizing the hardware resource.
sentences.cn: 本设计的优点在于系统的结构简洁,比较节约硬件资源.

sentences.en: Usually so laconic in the office, Dr. Lahey seemed less guarded, more relaxed.
sentences.cn: 平常在办公室里寡言少语的莱希医生似乎少了些拘谨，多了几分轻松。

words.tran_cn: 简洁；警句；简洁的语句；（语句的）简短

trans.tran_en: using only a few words to say something
